Ministers slate Defence Force Boeing plane breakdown as ‘embarrassing’ after PM Chris Luxon makes his own way to Australia https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/ministers-slate-defence-force-boeing-plane-breakdown-as-embarrassing-after-pm-chris-luxon-makes-his-own-way-至-澳大利亚/SDCBBKEGORCGFM7DCO3VAF74PU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/ministers-slate-defence-force-boeing-plane-breakdown-as-embarrassing-after-pm-chris-luxon-makes-his-own-way-至-澳大利亚/SDCBBKEGORCGFM7DCO3VAF74PU/ Claire Trevett, Thomas CoughlanDefence Minister Judith Collins said the breakdown resulted in 'pitying looks'. A breakdown this morning delayed Prime Minister Christopher Luxon’s trip to Australia and forced him to take a last-minute commercial flight. Photo / Mark Mitchell
